Articles.Content:
Greetings from Ground Control Denmark.

Have no knowledge about astro physics nor any experience with outer Space, but this game is so fun that I cant stop wanting to know and learn more about it.

I bought the game today after I stopped by this forum and saw how many great Things you have been adding to the great game.

Im digging in! See ya around...

Best regards...

Welcome to the community PanzerHue

Space is so very different to what we are used to as a ground dwelling species, nothing quite prepares you for that moment when understanding dawns, and you suddenly realize how objects move in space.

Have fun learning, and fly safe
